casebody.data:
The State, ex rel. Hadlock, Appellant, v. Corrigan, Judge, Appellee.

[Cite as State, ex rel. Hadlock, v. Corrigan (1991), 62 Ohio St.3d 202.]

(No. 91-1273 Submitted September 17, 1991 Decided December 11, 1991.) Wes Hadlock, pro se. Stephanie Tubbs Jones, Prosecuting Attorney, and Laurence R. Snyder, for appellee. Per Curiam.

We affirm the judgment of the court of appeals. None of appellant’s claims challenges the sentencing court’s jurisdiction; therefore, appeal and post-conviction relief are adequate remedies at law.

Judgment affirmed.

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Holmes, Douglas, Wright, H. Brown and Resnick, JJ., concur.
